content: Jet-lagged and disoriented, but nothing a true New Yorker can't handle. The skyline looks different now, through the lens of my Japanese adventures. Time to blend the hustle of NYC with the Zen I found. First step? Organizing a tech meetup with a sushi twist.
raw_content: "Jet-lagged and disoriented, but nothing a true New Yorker can't handle. The skyline looks different now, through the lens of my Japanese adventures. Time to blend the hustle of NYC with the Zen I found. First step? Organizing a tech meetup with a sushi twist. #NYC #TechZen"
